content.html: npm i -g @architect mkdir -p foo/public cd foo echo "hi" > public/index.html arc deploy 90 seconds later you have an s3 website backed by a stateless node runtime responding to http events capable of 10k rps out of the box. first two million events are free.
content.value:
npm i -g @architect 
mkdir -p foo/public
cd foo
echo "hi" > public/index.html
arc deploy

90 seconds later you have an s3 website backed by a stateless node runtime responding to http events capable of 10k rps out of the box. first two million events are free.
